description:
Remote Sales Representative (All 50 States)

Are you a high-quality sales professional looking for a remote opportunity? We are seeking motivated individuals to join our team, offering the flexibility to work either part-time or full-time and earn between $50,000 to $100,000+ in commissions.

This is an excellent chance to control your schedule and meet with clients virtually, over the phone, or in person.

Job Details

Unlimited Income Potential: Your earnings are uncapped!

Fully Remote: Work from anywhere.

New Agent Performance Bonus

Earn up to a 20% cash bonus on placed business within your first three months.

Earn a 15% raise in your first three months (5% per month).

Commission-Based: This position is commission-only with bonuses.

Frequent Raises: Raises are available every two months based on your performance.

Responsibilities

Obtain a Life & Health Insurance license for your state (we provide support for the course if needed).

Ensure you have a reliable computer and internet connection.

Exhibit self-discipline and a willingness to grow personally and professionally.

Develop leadership skills and grow into a leader within the organization.

Requirements

Ability to overcome challenges.

Strong communication skills.

Self-discipline, grit, and fortitude.

Positive growth mindset.

Desire to grow into a leader worth following.

About Us

We are dedicated to protecting families and individuals through every step of life's journey. We also focus on serving our communities and encouraging personal and professional development. As a leadership development company, we help families with financial services.

Our staff and agents have access to an expansive growth network and the opportunity to give back to the organizations and causes that are important to them.

Why Work With Us?

Work virtually from home.

No cap on commissions.

Opportunities for advancement.

Ability to scale your income and build your own agency.

Join us and take control of your career while making a difference in the lives of others!

Employment Type: Full-Time
